thread.title: Badass Face Art By Vanessa Davis
thread.title_full: Badass Face Art By Vanessa Davis

author: Rokas L
title: Badass Face Art By Vanessa Davis
text: 14 hours ago by​ Rokas L Click to unmute Source: YouTube Vanessa Davis is a makeup artist who’s work might intimidate some people, but her skill will impress probably everyone. Vanessa is drawn to skull symbolism, which in the Western culture is primarily a symbol of death and mortality. She often creates additional contrast by drawing a live animal or plant next to the skull, further highlighting the fragility of life. If you love her work, you can go to Vanessa’s Instagram channel and become one of her 119,000 followers!
